backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister for the Internet Computer.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no documented features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary describing the frontend App.tsx notice component and index.css OKLCH color system for the platform limitation message.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for the UI system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the 'CHETAN HFT' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component displaying a professional notice that this Internet Computer platform cannot generate MQL5 Expert Advisors and only supports Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Computer actor instances with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining purple-blue themed design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color system, custom animations, container settings, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state defining an MT5 Expert Advisor 'CHETAN HFT' with EMA-based buy strategy, grid orders, and basket trailing stop for XAUUSD M1, with five pending feature requests.
